inclusion.criterion: Male or female patients of ≥18 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a documented histologic diagnosis of newly diagnosed or glioblastoma multiforme (GBM), anaplastic astrocytoma (AA) or anaplastic mixed oligoastrocytoma (AOA).
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have at least one confirmed and evaluable tumor site.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a Karnofsky performance status ≥60% (or the equivalent ECOG level of 0-2) and an expected survival of ≥ three months.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No other chemotherapy for two weeks prior to treatment under this research protocol
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: This was followed by CPT-11 Weekly x4 with Avastin Q2 weeks/ 2 weeks rest and repeat cycle.

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or lactating.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Patients with significant intercurrent medical or psychiatric conditions that would place them at increased risk or affect their ability to receive or comply with treatment or post-treatment clinical monitoring.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Karnofsky performance status and expected survival are unknown. Patient's chemotherapy history is unclear.
